name: Cyberman2022
description:
Welcome to the Cyberworld 2022. 

You've stolen a chip from the biggest company here to bring back to your original world, in order to solve the greenhouse effect.

On your way back, there is going to be obstacles, danger zones, and enemies that will try to prevent you from taking it. 

Take it back and save your world!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In the terminals, you can move with WASD.

Besides moving, we now grant you the ability to double jump with space, shoot against enemies by left click, and dash with E.

Always press space to continue.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Collaborated with Muhammad and Mitchell.
